sourcesContent:
import { Container, BreadcrumbItem, Row, Col, Breadcrumb, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardImg, CardBody, CardFooter, Button, Form, FormInput, FormGroup, Collapse, Badge } from "shards-react"; import Collapsible from "react-collapsible"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabContent } from "react-bootstrap"; import uuidv4 from "uuid"; import Head from "next/head"; // Layout import Layout from "../../components/Layout"; import SEO from "react-seo-component"; const numberOfQuestions = 10; const MeetAna = props => ( Directed Situations | CXC Spanish Guide Home Listening Exercises Meet Ana Meet Ana

In this listening exercise we'll get to know a little about Ana. Listen to the audio below and answer the {numberOfQuestions}{" "} questions below.



See transcript}>



Questions
  • How old is Ana? }>

    Ana is 27 years old.

  • Where is Ana from?}>

    Ana is from Chicago.
  • In which country does Ana live?} >

    She lives in Spain.
  • What is her occupation?}>

    She is an English teacher. .

  • What does Ana plan on doing when she returns to the US? } >

    She plans to continue her studies

  • What does Ana do in her spear time?} >

    In her spare time she likes spending time with her friends, her dog and her husband.

  • Identify 2 reasons why Ana studies Spanish? } >
    • She is facinated by the history of Spain
    • She loves the culture
    • The people there are very nice
); export default MeetAna;
